error.message: A space or line break was encountered after the "@" character. Only valid identifiers, keywords, comments, "(" and "{" are valid at the start of a code block and they must occur immediately following "@" with no space in between.

error.webHostHtmlMessage:
Server Error in '/' Application.

Parser Error

Description: An error occurred during the parsing of a resource required to service this request. Please review the following specific parse error details and modify your source file appropriately.

Parser Error Message: A space or line break was encountered after the "@" character.  Only valid identifiers, keywords, comments, "(" and "{" are valid at the start of a code block and they must occur immediately following "@" with no space in between.


Source Error: 


Line 14: {
Line 15:     <img alt="product placement" title="product placement" src="@Session["adUri"]" height="40" />
Line 16: }@
